釖字的基本解释

釖
dāo
古同“刀”。
化学元素“钍”的旧译。

釖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dāo］
［《廣韻》都牢切，平豪，端。］
亦作“釖1”。
(1)兵器名。
(2)泛指屠宰、砍削、切割用的工具。
(3)形状象刀的东西。
(4)剖析；宰杀。
(5)古代钱币名。以青铜制成，主要流行于战国时代的齐、燕、赵三国。分齐莒刀、尖首刀、明刀、钝首刀等种类，其上铸有文字。秦时废；西汉末，王莽一度仿制，旋废。
(6)通“舠”。小船。
(7)通“魛”。鱼名。
(8)通“刁”。参见“刀刀”、“刀斗”。
(9)量词。纸张的计量单位。通常以一百张为一刀。
(10)姓。汉有刀间。见《汉书·货殖传》。西南地区少数民族亦有此姓。

釖字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　釖； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1296第01
【集韻】與刀同。

釖字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
釖字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
dāo
Gu Tong "knife".
The old translation of the chemical element "thorium".
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dāo］
["Guangyun" is firm, Pinghao, Duan. ]
Also known as "釖1".
(1) The name of the weapon.
(2) Generally refers to tools used for slaughter, chopping, and cutting.
(3) Something shaped like a knife.
(4) Analysis; slaughter.
(5) Ancient coin names. Made of bronze, it was mainly popular in the Three Kingdoms of Qi, Yan and Zhao during the Warring States Period. There are different types of knives, sharp knives, bright knives, blunt knives, etc., with characters cast on them. Qin was abolished; at the end of the Western Han Dynasty, Wang Mang was imitated and abandoned.
(6) Through "舠". boat.
(7) Through "魛". The name of the fish.
(8) Through "Diao". See "knife knife", "knife bucket".
(9) Quantifiers. The unit of measurement for paper. It usually costs one hundred sheets.
(10) Last name. Han has a knife room. See "Han Shu · Huo Shi Chuan". Minorities in Southwest China also have this surname.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集上】【Golden Word Department】　釖; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1296 No. 01
【Jiyun】Same as the knife.
